title: Monday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
DON QUIXOTE Episodes 1 and 2: In a Village of La Mancha

HOW TO SUCCEED LIKE A DARK LORD Episode 11: Literally…

SAVAGE MEMES Episode 70: NASA

REBEL DEAD REVENGE Episode 10: The Wrong Answer

Arktoons is very pleased to announce the launch today of DON QUIXOTE OF LA MANCHA, a toon newly translated from the original Spanish comic by Wise Path Books. Like Castalia Library, Arkhaven Comics is committed to the preservation of the Western canon.
